00025 //----------------------------------------------------------
00026 GrPolygonUberPatch::GrPolygonUberPatch( GrPolygonGroup* polygons, unsigned int* polyIndices, unsigned int polyCount,
00027                                                                                 const MPlane& worldPlane, const MMat4x4& uvTileMatrix, const SVec2& uvPos,
00028                                                                                 const SVec2& uvSize )
00029 : _polygons( polygons )
00030 , _polyIndices( polyIndices )
00031 , _polyCount( polyCount )
00032 , _surfacePlane( worldPlane )
00033 , _uvTileMatrix( uvTileMatrix )
00034 , _uvSize( uvSize )
00035 , _uberTexIndex( 0 )
00036 , _tileX( 0 )
00037 , _tileY( 0 )
00038 , _tileWidth( ( unsigned int )( int )Ceil( uvSize.x * GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TILES ) + 1 )
00039 , _tileHeight( ( unsigned int )( int )Ceil( uvSize.y * GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TILES ) + 1 )
00040 {
00042         _polyIndices = new unsigned int[ polyCount ];
00043         MemCopy( _polyIndices, polyIndices, polyCount * sizeof( unsigned int ) );
00044 
00046         _uvTileMatrix( 0, 3 ) = -Floor( uvPos.x * GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TILES );
00047         _uvTileMatrix( 1, 3 ) = -Floor( uvPos.y * GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TILES );
00048 
00051         const float kHalfTexel = 0.5f / GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TEXELS;
00052         TranslateUVs( -uvPos + SVec2( kHalfTexel, kHalfTexel ) );
00053 
00055         CalcSurfaceInfo();
00056 }

00059 GrPolygonUberPatch::~GrPolygonUberPatch()
00060 {
00061         delete[] _polyIndices;
00062 }

00069 //----------------------------------------------------------
00070 void
00071 GrPolygonUberPatch::AssignToUberTexture( unsigned int uberTexIndex, unsigned int tileX, unsigned int tileY )
00072 {
00074         float uvTileDeltaX = ( float )( ( int )tileX - ( int )_tileX );
00075         float uvTileDeltaY = ( float )( ( int )tileY - ( int )_tileY );
00076 
00078         _uberTexIndex = uberTexIndex;
00079 
00081         _tileX = tileX;
00082         _tileY = tileY;
00083 
00085         _uvTileMatrix( 0, 3 ) += uvTileDeltaX;
00086         _uvTileMatrix( 1, 3 ) += uvTileDeltaY;
00087 
00089         float invSizeInTiles = 1.0f / GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TILES;
00090         float uvDeltaX = invSizeInTiles * uvTileDeltaX;
00091         float uvDeltaY = invSizeInTiles * uvTileDeltaY;
00092         TranslateUVs( SVec2( uvDeltaX, uvDeltaY ) );
00093 
00095 #if 1
00096         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _polyCount; ++i )
00097         {
00099                 const GrPolygon& curPoly = _polygons->GetPolygon( _polyIndices[ i ] );
00100 
00102                 unsigned int vertexCount = curPoly.GetVertexCount();
00103                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < vertexCount; ++j )
00104                 {
00105                         B_ASSERT( curPoly.GetVertex( j ).uv.x < 1.0f );
00106                         B_ASSERT( curPoly.GetVertex( j ).uv.y < 1.0f );
00107                         B_ASSERT( curPoly.GetVertex( j ).uv.x >= 0.0f );
00108                         B_ASSERT( curPoly.GetVertex( j ).uv.y >= 0.0f );
00109                 }
00110         }
00111 #endif
00112 }

00130 GrPolygonUberPatch::GetPolygonIndex( unsigned int i ) const

00141 //----------------------------------------------------------
00142 void
00143 GrPolygonUberPatch::TranslateUVs( const SVec2& translate )
00144 {
00147         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _polyCount; ++i )
00148         {
00150                 const GrPolygon& curPoly = _polygons->GetPolygon( _polyIndices[ i ] );
00151 
00153                 unsigned int vertexCount = curPoly.GetVertexCount();
00154                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < vertexCount; ++j )
00155                         _polygons->SetPolygonUV( _polyIndices[ i ], j, curPoly.GetVertex( j ).uv + translate );
00156         }
00157 }
00158 
00159 //----------------------------------------------------------
00160 void
00161 GrPolygonUberPatch::CalcSurfaceInfo()
00162 {
00164         unsigned int patchVertCount = 0;
00165         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _polyCount; ++i )
00166                 patchVertCount += _polygons->GetPolygon( _polyIndices[ i ] ).GetVertexCount();
00167 
00169         MVec3 centroid;
00170         MVec3 minPoint(  FLT_MAX,  FLT_MAX,  FLT_MAX );
00171         MVec3 maxPoint( -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX );
00172         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _polyCount; ++i )
00173         {
00174                 const GrPolygon& curPoly = _polygons->GetPolygon( _polyIndices[ i ] );
00175                 unsigned int vertCount = curPoly.GetVertexCount();
00176                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < vertCount; ++j )
00177                 {
00178                         MVec3 position = curPoly.GetVertex( j ).position;
00179                         centroid += position;
00180                         minPoint.AssignMin( position );
00181                         maxPoint.AssignMax( position );
00182                 }
00183         }
00184 
00186         _aaBox.SetCenter( 0.5f * ( maxPoint + minPoint ) );
00187         _aaBox.SetHalfExts( 0.5f * ( maxPoint - minPoint ) );
00188 }
